org.microprog.regex.wizards
Class RegExWizard

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.eclipse.jface.wizard.Wizard
        |
        +--org.microprog.regex.wizards.RegExWizard
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.ui.INewWizard, org.eclipse.jface.wizard.IWizard, org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchWizard
public class RegExWizard
extends org.eclipse.jface.wizard.Wizard
implements org.eclipse.ui.INewWizard

This is a Regular Expression Editor new wizard. Its role is to create a new file resource in the provided container. If the container resource (a folder or a project) is selected in the workspace when the wizard is opened, it will accept it as the target container. The wizard creates one file with the extension "rx".

performFinish

public boolean performFinish()
This method is called when 'Finish' button is pressed in the wizard. We will create an operation and run it using wizard as execution context.
